iaik.pdf.pdfbox

Class CertificationSignaturePdfBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.pdfbox.PdfSignatureDetailsPdfBox
      • iaik.pdf.pdfbox.ApprovalSignaturePdfBox
        • iaik.pdf.pdfbox.CertificationSignaturePdfBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApprovalSignature, CertificationSignature, PdfSignatureDetails

    public class CertificationSignaturePdfBox
extends ApprovalSignaturePdfBox
implements CertificationSignature
    Implementation of the CertificationSignature interface using PdfBox.

      • getModificationPermission

        public CertificationSignature.ModificationPermission getModificationPermission()
                                                                        throws PdfSignatureException,
                                                                               java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: CertificationSignature
        Check what kind of modifications are allowed, returns null if the document contains no certification signature.
        Specified by:
        getModificationPermission in interface CertificationSignature
        Returns:
        ModificationPermission as given in the certification signature or null if not defined
        Throws:
        PdfSignatureException - if more than one certification signature was found
        java.io.IOException - if the document can't be read
